casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Terry GILMORE No. 45P07-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Terry Gilmore, for Gilmore, Terry. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 13th of March 2019 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 13th of March 2019 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Gaston County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of March 2019 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
